**Title**: DP Project Manuscript: Do species in the genus _Cheniella_ (Fabaceae) belong to the rainforest biome?

Charlotte Hagelstam Renshaw^1^

1.  University of Montreal


\newpage

## Abstract

We will use cleaned species occurrence data downloaded from herbaria databases as well as global biome maps to study the distribution of the pantropical legume subfamily Cercidoideae (Fabaceae).

## Methods

Dataset were downloaded by genus from https://www.gbif.org/ and then cleaned in R using the dplyr, raster, sp, ggplot2 and tidyverse packages. Cleaned datasets were compared to the rainforest biome map using the extract function in the raster package.
